snippet.title: Lotus Digital (Official Trailer)
snippet.description:
Lotus is a beautiful game that grows into a unique work of art every time you play...and now it's available on phones and tablets!

"The controls are intuitive, the graphics beautiful, and the sound thematic...If you are a fan of the Lotus card game, then grabbing this one should be an easy decision." - Board Game Quest

"With beautifully polished animations, the game's UI has been smartly adapted to touchscreens." -- KickMyGeek

"Lotus Digital scores highest with its beautiful appearance, but the gameplay proves to be quite strategically profound." -- iPlayApps
